newsitem.title: ESTONIA: HANSAPANK LOWERS BASE INTEREST RATE.
newsitem.headline: HANSAPANK LOWERS BASE INTEREST RATE.

text.p: Hansapank lowered its base rate on Estonian kroon loans by one percent to 13 percent on Tuesday, the bank said.

Hansapank has improved its liquidity by taking a 100 million mark syndicated loan last month, Hansapank interest rate products and financial risks head Erkki Raasuke told Reuters, explaining the decision to cut the base rate.
Hansapank also brought the interest rate marginal between kroon and mark loans closer as there is confidence on the Estonian kroon exchange rate, he added.
